title: Akali On Free Rotation?
body: It's been a while since she's been on there. Last time I saw her was about around February or early March. Pls Rito.

replies.body: There's 140 champions they have to cycle through, changing 14 champs weekly that's 10 weeks or 2 and a half months gap for each champion. If you saw her on rotation in early March it's gonna be a while yet.
